code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Form}from'react-bootstrap';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faSearch,faTimes}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchBox(){const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState('');const history=useHistory();const submitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(keyword){history.push("/?keyword=".concat(keyword,"&page=1"));}else{history.push(history.location.pathname);}setKeyword('');};const clearSearch=()=>{setKeyword('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:submitHandler,inline:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",name:"q",onChange:e=>setKeyword(e.target.value),value:keyword,className:"mr-sm-1 ml-sm-5",placeholder:"Search products...",autoFocus:true}),keyword&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"button",variant:"light",className:"p-2",onClick:clearSearch,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faTimes})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"outline-success",className:"p-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faSearch})})]});}export default SearchBox;
